column4: how do u use clamav, i have it installed but how do i start it?
how do i make it scan the whole wine program?
clamscan not clamscam. and you need clamscan -r ~/.wine/* to scan subdirs
you might also want to run freshclam to update the definitions
does it ask you to check permissions? you have to sudo it
after the dont panic its blinking, does that mean its updating or do i actually have to go on their site?
i closed terminal and opened new one and it worked :)
k, now ill scan and thx
o ya more importantly, wats the command do scan the whole comp?
